code: import axios from"axios";var API_URL="http://localhost:8001/api/auth/";var register=function register(user){return axios.post(API_URL+"signup",user);};var login=function login(user){return axios.post(API_URL+"signin",user).then(function(response){if(response.data.accessToken){localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(response.data));}return response.data;});};var logout=function logout(){localStorage.removeItem("user");};var getCurrentUser=function getCurrentUser(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user"));};export default{register:register,login:login,logout:logout,getCurrentUser:getCurrentUser};
